Test Name: Hemophilia A F8 Gene Intron 1 Inversion Mutation Analysis (Prenatal)
Specimen Type: Chorionic villi tissue (CVS) or amniotic fluid
Purpose: Prenatal detection of the intron 1 inversion mutation in the F8 gene associated with Hemophilia A.
Container: Sterile container appropriate for chorionic villus samples or amniotic fluid
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, PCR thermocycler, agarose gel electrophoresis apparatus, UV transilluminator, Qubit fluorometer
